translations: 宣告……无罪；赦免，免除（absolve 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: And I can't see any way of absolving the consumer of responsibility.
sentences.translation: 同时我也无法看出消费者有什么办法可以逃脱责任。

sentences.sentence: I'm not absolving myself from blame just because I was not playing.
sentences.translation: 我不是只是因为我没有参加比赛就把自己从责任中开脱出去。

sentences.sentence: Rafael declined to sign a paper absolving his jailers of responsibility in the event of his death in custody.
sentences.translation: 拉斐尔拒绝在一份“如果犯人在关押期间死亡，看守可以免于责任”的文件上签字。
